mapper.insert: insert into bi_filebrowse_rule_detail ( guid, masterfk, objecttype, objectguid, objectname, DATASEQ, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID#, #MASTERFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update bi_filebrowse_rule_detail
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, masterfk=#MASTERFK#, objecttype=#OBJECTTYPE#, objectguid=#OBJECTGUID#, objectname=#OBJECTNAME#,
where guid = #GUID#
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM bi_filebrowse_rule_detail A WHERE A.GUID = #GUID#
